H0.text: Fragmentation is the process of breaking an individual into parts followed by regeneration.

H1.text: Minimization is the process of breaking an individual into parts followed by regeneration.

H2.text: Erosion is the process of breaking an individual into parts followed by regeneration.

H3.text: Destruction is the process of breaking an individual into parts followed by regeneration.

A4.text: Fragmentation (reproduction), a form of asexual reproduction
